00026 #ifndef __OgreThreadDefinesPoco_H__
00027 #define __OgreThreadDefinesPoco_H__
00028 
00029 #define OGRE_AUTO_MUTEX mutable Poco::Mutex OGRE_AUTO_MUTEX_NAME;
00030 #define OGRE_LOCK_AUTO_MUTEX Poco::Mutex::ScopedLock ogreAutoMutexLock(OGRE_AUTO_MUTEX_NAME);
00031 #define OGRE_MUTEX(name) mutable Poco::Mutex name;
00032 #define OGRE_STATIC_MUTEX(name) static Poco::Mutex name;
00033 #define OGRE_STATIC_MUTEX_INSTANCE(name) Poco::Mutex name;
00034 #define OGRE_LOCK_MUTEX(name) Poco::Mutex::ScopedLock ogrenameLock(name);
00035 #define OGRE_LOCK_MUTEX_NAMED(mutexName, lockName) Poco::Mutex::ScopedLock lockName(mutexName);
00036 // like OGRE_AUTO_MUTEX but mutex held by pointer
00037 #define OGRE_AUTO_SHARED_MUTEX mutable Poco::Mutex *OGRE_AUTO_MUTEX_NAME;
00038 #define OGRE_LOCK_AUTO_SHARED_MUTEX assert(OGRE_AUTO_MUTEX_NAME); Poco::Mutex::ScopedLock ogreAutoMutexLock(*OGRE_AUTO_MUTEX_NAME);
00039 #define OGRE_NEW_AUTO_SHARED_MUTEX assert(!OGRE_AUTO_MUTEX_NAME); OGRE_AUTO_MUTEX_NAME = new Poco::Mutex();
00040 #define OGRE_DELETE_AUTO_SHARED_MUTEX assert(OGRE_AUTO_MUTEX_NAME); delete OGRE_AUTO_MUTEX_NAME;
00041 #define OGRE_COPY_AUTO_SHARED_MUTEX(from) assert(!OGRE_AUTO_MUTEX_NAME); OGRE_AUTO_MUTEX_NAME = from;
00042 #define OGRE_SET_AUTO_SHARED_MUTEX_NULL OGRE_AUTO_MUTEX_NAME = 0;
00043 #define OGRE_MUTEX_CONDITIONAL(mutex) if (mutex)
00044 #define OGRE_THREAD_SYNCHRONISER(sync) Poco::Condition sync;
00045 #define OGRE_THREAD_WAIT(sync, mutex, lock) sync.wait(mutex);
00046 #define OGRE_THREAD_NOTIFY_ONE(sync) sync.signal(); 
00047 #define OGRE_THREAD_NOTIFY_ALL(sync) sync.broadcast(); 
00048 // Read-write mutex
00049 #define OGRE_RW_MUTEX(name) mutable Poco::RWLock name
00050 #define OGRE_LOCK_RW_MUTEX_READ(name) Poco::RWLock::ScopedLock ogrenameLock(name, false);
00051 #define OGRE_LOCK_RW_MUTEX_WRITE(name) Poco::RWLock::ScopedLock ogrenameLock(name, true);
00052 // Thread-local pointer
00053 #define OGRE_THREAD_POINTER(T, var) Poco::ThreadLocal<SharedPtr<T> > var
00054 #define OGRE_THREAD_POINTER_INIT(var) var()
00055 #define OGRE_THREAD_POINTER_VAR(T, var) Poco::ThreadLocal<SharedPtr<T> > var
00056 #define OGRE_THREAD_POINTER_GET(var) var.get().get()
00057 #define OGRE_THREAD_POINTER_SET(var, expr) { var.get().setNull(); var.get().bind(expr); }
00058 #define OGRE_THREAD_POINTER_DELETE(var) var.get().setNull()
00059 // Thread objects and related functions
00060 #define OGRE_THREAD_TYPE Poco::Thread
00061 #define OGRE_THREAD_CREATE(name, worker) Poco::Thread* name = OGRE_NEW_T(Poco::Thread, MEMCATEGORY_GENERAL)(); name->start(worker); 
00062 #define OGRE_THREAD_DESTROY(name) OGRE_DELETE_T(name, Thread, MEMCATEGORY_GENERAL)
00063 #define OGRE_THREAD_HARDWARE_CONCURRENCY 2
00064 #define OGRE_THREAD_CURRENT_ID (size_t)Poco::Thread::current()
00065 #define OGRE_THREAD_WORKER_INHERIT : public Poco::Runnable
00066 // (hardware concurrency is not accessible via POCO atm)
00067 // Utility
00068 #define OGRE_THREAD_SLEEP(ms) Poco::Thread::sleep(ms);
00069 
00070 #endif
